remarks: Extend ~ lgsquad to coprime odd integers (the domain of the Jacobi symbol).  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 19-Jun-2015.)
statement:
lgsquad2.1 $e |- ( ph -> M e. NN ) $.
lgsquad2.2 $e |- ( ph -> -. 2 || M ) $.
lgsquad2.3 $e |- ( ph -> N e. NN ) $.
lgsquad2.4 $e |- ( ph -> -. 2 || N ) $.
lgsquad2.5 $e |- ( ph -> ( M gcd N ) = 1 ) $.
lgsquad2 $p |- ( ph -> ( ( M /L N ) x. ( N /L M ) ) = ( -u 1 ^ ( ( ( M - 1 ) / 2 ) x. ( ( N - 1 ) / 2 ) ) ) ) $.
